title: Cam Speech - Listen as u Read
creator: virinchy

extendedInfo.description: Turn your smartphone into a Talking Device with character recognition (OCR). Cam Speech will convert your documents from your camera into a voice .To keep the application simple cam speech supports only english language.Did you ever felt like your book/magazine/newspaper talking with you?Do you want to create you own pod casts?Do you ever feel boring to read a long paragraphs?Then CAM SPEECH is for you.CAM SPEECH creates an experience to listen while you reads.Instructions:Point the device towards the text to listen.Select the area of interest and click the camera button to capture the text.That's it.Listen the captured image .Please View the options in the application for instructions.Hidden Option: Long press on the recognized text to share with your friends.Do check for a network connectivity for the first time you install the application.CAM SPEECH is a prototype of the OCR working .We can work together to make this Application even better :::Have a problem, and want to notify us?Have a functionality in mind, that you would like us to implement?Have a suggestion?Do write us your valuable suggestions and feedback :virinchyplay@gmail.comSome tags: OCR,googles. scan,Image to Voice,extract text, images, Scan To Speech, scan text, scan to text, extract text from image, convert image to text. Convert image to voice, sms,cam,image,reader,photo,vision,pic,reading,talk,text,speech,blind,recognition,passbook,talking.
